::Zardus::

Zardus' looks down at his wrist comp as it beeps, his eyes widening when he 
sees that the forest around them is almost filled with bots (Deemos' group). 
He swears, activating his comm-link.

"Lavacons, Gotron, Bloodystrike," he says nto it, "Return to base. There is a 
battle brewing."

He opens a channel to the rest of the Alliance members. "Everyone, prepare 
for battle. A group is on their way."

Zardus turns to look at the forest, his hand near his plasma launcher.
